tasks.dev: deno task build && deno task dev:fast
tasks.dev:linux:x86_64: deno task build:linux:x86_64 && deno task dev:fast
tasks.test: deno task test:rust && deno task test:deno
tasks.test:linux:x86_64: deno task test:rust && deno task test:deno:linux:x86_64
tasks.test:deno: deno task build && export RUST_LIB_PATH=$CARGO_TARGET_DIR/debug && deno test -A
tasks.test:deno:linux:x86_64: deno task build:linux:x86_64 && export RUST_LIB_PATH=$CARGO_TARGET_DIR/debug && deno test -A
